Entries.GiftReaction_Sunflower_Birthday: ... F-For- Me?$7#$b#I-I....$7#$b#Sorry farmer, I'm making a scene- It's just...$13#$b#It's... It's my favorite flower.$4#$b#It feels weird to admit that. Even weirder to receive them on my birthday...$4#$e#It's so touching, thank you.$13#$b#I won't forget this birthday in quite some time.$4#$b#I'll be sure to get you something extra nice for yours, alright?$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Strange_Bun_Birthday: Yoba's wrinkly mother-- For me?!$7#$b#This is the BEST birthday gift! These things are so tasty, I don't know why my family thinks I'm insane.#$e#Thank you so much farmer!$1#$b#Here, wanna split it with me$10?#$b#Nothing like a Strange Bun to say 'Live another long, happy year.'$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer_Birthday: Ah, thanks for the drink farmer. I'll invite the next round next time you come by the Saloon.#$e#Oh! It's for my birthday? Thanks for remembering.$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Field_Snack_Birthday: Mmm, nothing like a good energy bar to get my birthday started. Thanks, farmer!#$b#To top it all off, the ones you make are BOMB.$1#$b#Thanks for thinking of me.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Pancakes_Birthday: For me? $7#$b#Oh my god these are JUST like Mia makes them. You are the BEST farmer.$1#$b#This is such a birthday treat, has to be my favorite.
Entries.GiftReaction_Scalloped_Potatoes_Birthday: Mmm, just like grandma used to make them.#$b#Henry's been the only one who has really been able to capture the flavor but he rarely has time to make it.#$b#The flavor always brings me back to her warm touch...$4#$b#Thank you, @. This genuinely means a lot to me.#$b#Best birthday gift ever.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Kitty_Muffin_Birthday: OHHH. I LOVE these!$1#$b#It's for my birthday? You're the BEST farmer.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Morning_Cat_Toast_Birthday: MMM Nothing like a breakfast of champions before a GREAT birthday day.$1#$b#Thank you so much farmer! These are just how Mia makes them too.$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Muffin_Birthday: OHHH. I LOVE these!$1#$b#It's for my birthday? You're the BEST farmer.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Sunflower: ...!$7#$b#These... They're, so pretty.$4#$b#I knew sunflowers were pretty but I never thought about someone gifting them to me I...$4#$b#Sorry, I'm getting self conscious. Been the one giving flowers all my life, I suppose. It's a strange... Welcome change
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-80: ...!$7#$b#For... Me? Do you have the right person?$7#$b#N-No I just... Sorry, I don't mean to be weird.$7#$b#I've never really... Gotten flowers before in my life. Didn't really think dudes could get them.#$b#...Thank you.$4
Entries.GiftReaction_Cranberries: Uhh, careful there farmer! I'm incredibly allergic to these, and the reaction if I come near them won't be any pretty, I promise.$3
Entries.GiftReaction_Field_Snack: {{Random: Mmm, nothing like a good snack to get through the day.#$b#Thanks farmer!++Oh man I love these, nothing like your field snacks, farmer.++Ohhh yes, come to me baby.$10#$b#Sorry farmer, I was talking to the field-snacks.$|inputSeparator=++}}
Entries.GiftReaction_Strange_Bun: Ohh farmer, you have no idea how much I kneaded one of these.$10#$b#I was so bready for a tasty snack. Dough you want to share it with me?$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Pancakes: Oh dear Yoba these are so cute. I lose my mind when Mia makes them.$1#$b#Thanks, hotstuff. You're a real one.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Scalloped_Potatoes: Potatoes? Butter? Chives? LOADS of cream?$9#$b#Dear lord, farmer, you're just trying to earn your way straight into my heart.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Kitty_Muffin: Ohhh, shoot, farmer! The day ain't got muffin on me with one of these bad boys.$10#$b#Thank you so much, hotstuff.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Morning_Cat_Toast: Man, this reminds me how much I hate cat puns.$11#$b#Just kitten!$9#$b#I find them HISSterical.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Summer_Pink_Lemonade: Ah!$1#$b#Thanks farmer, I was real thirsty. This is great.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Muffin: OH! Thanks farmer, these are....#$b#These are...$2#$b#Bear with me farmer, I'll think of a pun soon.$3
Entries.GiftReaction_Crab_Croissant: I see you've developed an appreciation for Mia's food.$10#$b#Oh don't worry, that is the HIGHEST of compliments.$10#$b#Mia is a great cook, isn't she? These are delicious, thank you farmer.
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer: Ah! Nothing like a good beer to really hit it where it matters. Thanks farmer, you're a doll. $1
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~1: Are you trying to like speedrun our friendship with my favorite drinks farmer?$10#$b#Because if you are, it's working. Keep it up, I can feel my imaginary heart     going  up.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~2: What's that, trying to get me drunk to lower my standards, @?$10#$b#Worry not, alcohol in my system or not, you're just as hot.$10#$b#And also my standards are already on the ground. $1
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~3: Nothing like a beer to lighten the spirits, you're really trying to get on my good side, aren't you?$10#$b#Worry not farmer, you've already stolen my heart away. Lucky you I'll take the beer as due payment for it.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale: OH! You're the best farmer, thank you!#$b#You know, back in the city it was really hard getting your hands on pale ale. Some hipster drink it was. Happy to get my hands on this treat.
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale~1: Oh this looks so good. Are the hops from your farm? $1#$b#I look forwards to trying it.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale~2: %farm 's pale ale? I can't wait to try!#$b#You know, I was really excited to try Gus' pale ale when I came to town.#$b#Unfortunately it wasn't ale it's cracked up to be!$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Mead: You're a true friend, you know that farmer?$10#$b#After all, a friend in Mead is a friend indeed!$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Mead~1: OHO, I mead to know why you're so kind to me. Why thank you, farmer.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Mead~2: Mmm, nothing like a drink to lighten up a day. You're the best!$10#$b#Had I known valley people were so generous I would've moved sooner.
Entries.GiftReaction_Wine: You have no idea how much I needed a drink today.#$b#Ahhh... Yeah, that hits the spot. Thanks, farmer.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Wine~1: Are you trying to like speedrun our friendship with my favorite drinks farmer?$10#$b#Because if you are, it's working. Keep it up, I can feel my imaginary heart meter going  up.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Wine~2: Ohhh farmer, you're so bottleful to me when you're so generous. I love it when great minds drink alike.#$b#Nothing like a good drink to wine down.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Piña_Colada: Are you trying to like speedrun our friendship with my favorite drinks farmer?$10#$b#Because if you are, it's working. Keep it up, I can feel my imaginary heart meter going  up.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Piña_Colada~1: Mmm, nothing like a pina colada and getting caught in the rain. $1
Entries.GiftReaction_Piña_Colada~2: You have no idea how much I needed a drink today.#$b#Ahhh... Yeah, that hits the spot. Thanks, farmer.$9

Entries.GiftReaction_Sunflower_Birthday: ... Holy crap.$13#$b#F-For like, me?$1#$b#You really went and grew my favorte flowers for my birthday- I-- Holy crap, love.$4#$b#I've never felt this loved before. Thank you so much. Thank you.$13
Entries.GiftReaction_Strange_Bun_Birthday: !$7#$b#Shoot muffin. You really want me to go and marry you, don't cha?$10#$b#Happy birthday to me! I love these things.$9#$b#Now tell me, did you happen to loot these from some weird monster? Or maybe uncovered it in a deep level of the mines?
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer_Birthday: Oh my. No better birthday gift than my love enabling my addiction.$10#$b#Thanks, lover.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Field_Snack_Birthday: OH! Did you make these love?$1#$b#For my birthday? Thank you!$9#$b#You know it's funny, one day you live at the city, and the next you live in the valley and your significant other is making you tree-seed snacks for your birthday.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Pancakes_Birthday: Mia's special pancakes? For MY birthday?$1#$b#Love did you learn how to make these from Mia just for me?$1#$b#I swear I don't deserve you, thank you, sunshine.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Scalloped_Potatoes_Birthday: Yoba this smells wonderful. Did you make this for me? $1#$b#God, love. You're a Yoba sent, my grandma and Henry would be jealous at how much you nailed this.$9#$b#Thank you, cupcake, you didn't have to go this far just for my birthday.
Entries.GiftReaction_Kitty_Muffin_Birthday: Yoba cupcake, you're such a great cook. Do you ever get tired being this awesome?$1#$b#These muffins are my favorite birthday treat, thanks doll.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Morning_Cat_Toast_Birthday: For my birthday? Thank you love!$9#$b#Why don't we toast to us?$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Bear_Muffin_Birthday: Yoba cupcake, you're such a great cook. Do you ever get tired being this awesome?$1#$b#These muffins are my favorite birthday treat, thanks doll.$10
Entries.GiftReaction_Sunflower: Ahh man I...$4#$b#These are gorgeous, thank you so much. I-I don't know what to say, they're my favorite.#$b#No partner had ever given me flowers before.$4
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-80: ... @!$9#$b#Thank you so much, I... I really like flowers.#$b#It feels weird to admit, isn't that normally a girl thing?$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Cranberries: Ahhh, love, you should know I'm *very* allergic to Cranberries. They come near me, and I grow very, very sick.$3#$b#Best sell them, poppet, I'm not eager on dying any time soon.$3
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer: Why thank you, hotstuff. This one is going straight to daddy's gut.$10#$b#.... I promise to never call myself daddy again if you don't stop getting me drinks.$3
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~1: You don't need to get me drunk, darling, I'm already *madly* into you. This is just icing on the cake
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~2: Mmm, finally someone who'll actually enable me. It was getting tiring getting yelled at every time I opened a beer.#$b#*smooch* Thank you, love! I'll think of you while I drink it.$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~3: Thank you, love. I.... I don't know, should I really?#$b#I think I'll save it for tomorrow...
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale: Ah, thank you dearest! You're the best. Alcohol budget was starting to get tight.$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale~1: When my friend fell asleep at the bar I poured ale at him. It was a brewed awakening.$9
Entries.GiftReaction_Pale_Ale~2: Ahh... Just when I said I tried not drinking tonight.$3#$b#Oh well! There's always tomorrow!$9

Entries.GiftReaction_Mead~1: Ah, thank you dearest! You're the best. Alcohol budget was starting to get tight.$1
Entries.GiftReaction_Mead~2: Oh sweet, refreshments! Thanks love, you're positively the best.$9

Entries.GiftReaction_Sunflower: God, you're such a sweetheart, you know that?#$b#Sunflowers are my favorite, it makes me so happy every time you remember.$4
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-80: {{Random:I never thought I would like getting flowers so much, thank you, poppet.$4++ These are so gorgeous, I'll go grab a vase for them!#$b#Just not nearly as beautiful as you.$4 ++ God, I can't believe I still blush every time you give me flowers. I am INCREDIBLY allergic. Unless you're trying to become a young window, best keep those away from me.$3
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer: ... This isn't really funny, @.$5#$b#I'm really trying to stay sober, you don't have to mock me like this.$11
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~1: Do you think I'm not fighting the urge to go to the saloon and drink myself until I don't wake up every day, @?$8#$b#Yeah? Then I'd appreciate it if you didn't try to shove alcohol in my face.
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~2: I... I didn't cut off Shane and my old friends for you to be the one to start enabling me.$5#$b#Please, I don't want it to be you too.$2
Entries.GiftReaction_Beer~3: This is very cruel of you, @. You know I'm struggling.$11#$b#You're supposed to be there for me, not drag me further into the hole.$5
